greeting.text: Fresh fish! Best prices at the... Oh, a courier! Perfect timing. I've got deliveries that need to go out and messages for my suppliers. Business never stops in the fish trade!

choices.text: What kind of deliveries do you need?
What's the catch of the day?

explain_deliveries.text: I need someone to take orders to the Merchant's Rest - they want fresh salmon for tonight's dinner. Also got a message for my supplier upriver about next week's shipment. Standard courier rates, quick coin for quick feet!

choices.text: I can take one of those messages.

talk_fish.text: Hah! A courier who appreciates good fish! Got some beautiful mackerel this morning, and the salmon's so fresh it practically swam here itself. Tell you what - deliver a message for me, and I'll throw in a nice piece for your dinner.

choices.text: Now that's an offer I can't refuse!
I'll stick to courier work, thanks.

browse_away.text: Well, if you need fish or delivery work, Frans is your man! Best fish at the docks, and always got messages that need sending!

appreciate_efficiency.text: Now that's what I like - efficiency! Here's the order list for the Rest and the supplier message. Get them both delivered before evening and there's a bonus in it for you!

which_one.text: The Merchant's Rest order is more urgent - they need it by dinner time. The supplier message can wait another day or two. Your choice!

choices.text: I'll take the urgent one to the Merchant's Rest.

fish_deal.text: Smart courier! Here's a message for the Harbor Master about tomorrow's fishing permits. Deliver it by end of day, and I'll have a nice salmon steak wrapped and waiting for you!

give_urgent.text: Good choice! Time is money in the restaurant business. Here's the order - make sure they know it's the premium cuts!

give_supplier.text: Reliable choice! My supplier appreciates punctual messages. Here's the letter - standard payment when you return with confirmation.
